popup-filter-sidebar.description: Also hide brands in the sidebar

popup-sidebar-hide.description: Hide filtered items in the sidebar

popup-sidebar-grey.description: Grey out filtered items in the sidebar

popup-allow-refine-bypass.description: Disable filtering when you select a brand in the sidebar

popup-list-version.description: Show what version of the list we have

popup-list-count.description: How many brands we know about

popup-feedback-link.description: Link to github to report issues or request features

popup-missing-brand.description: Link to AmazonBrandFilter to request a brand be added

popup-last-run.description: How long the last run took
